content: I think I'll take my time to research the installation process and consider seeking professional help if needed. I've already seen the benefits of suspension adjustments, and I'm excited to take my car's handling to the next level with coilovers. Thanks for the guidance! By the way, I'm planning to attend another autocross event soon, and I'm hoping to shave off even more seconds from my time. Do you have any tips on how to improve my driving skills and consistency on the course?
